nodes.text: Darkon III was a planet of the Darkon system, within the Chaama sector, in the Mid Rim region of the galaxy. In 0 BBY, the corporate criminal Linkaas requested that his employee, the smuggler Dannen Lifehold, make a stop in Darkon III, before proceeding to his destination, the planet Dohu VII. This was in order for Linkaas to gain time to organize a trap on Dohu VII for the smuggler.

Darkon III was first mentioned briefly in the short story "Breaking Free: The Adventures of Dannen Lifehold," written by Dave Marron and later published in February 1, 1994 within the Star Wars Adventure Journal 1. The Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion placed the Darkon system in grid square J-7.
